title: Studio/Efficiency All Bills Paid near the Airport & Tesla
posting_body: This efficiency apartment is approximately 330 sq.
The rent is $800 per month and the owner pays for electricity, water and trash.
It is located within the Tejas Mobile Plaza on East Highway 71, less than one mile to the entrance of Austin-Bergstrom Intl.
Airport and about 5 minutes from the Tesla plant.
The unit in this four-plex features vinyl tile flooring, ceiling fan, air conditioner/heater unit, bath with shower stall, and a bedroom closet.
The kitchen has a full-size refrigerator, stove, and a disposal.
There is one parking space for this unit and due to limited space, only renters with one car are allowed.
Owner prefers a 6 month or longer lease but the term is negotiable.
